bibl.title: Pap. Hamburg. 128: A Hellenistic Ars Poetica.
bibl.note: P. Hamb. II, 128 (= Pack2 1502), recently republished in: W.W. FORTENBAUGH et alii, Theophrastus of Eresus: Sources for his Life, Writings, Thought and Influence. II (Leiden, 1992) pp. 612-617, Appendix No. 9. Rejects the ascription to Theophrastus and considers preferable to characterize the text as a Hellenistic Ars Poetica.
SCHENKEVELD D.M., Pap. Hamburg. 128: A Hellenistic Ars Poetica.
